{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20737v1", "title": "Path-connectedness of incompressible Euler solutions", "summary": "We study the incompressible Euler equation and prove that the set of weak
solutions is path-connected. More precisely, we construct paths of H\"older
regularity $C^{1/2}$, valued in $C^0_{t, loc} L^2_x$ endowed with the strong
topology. The main result relies on a convex integration construction adapted
from the seminal work of De Lellis and Sz\'ekelyhidi [14, The Euler equations
as a differential inclusion], extending it to a more broader geometric
framework, replacing balls with arbitrary convex compact sets.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-29T13:21:25Z"}
